tuv.seg: The Council of State is an advisory body that aids and counsels the President
Údarás comhairle í an Chomhairle Stáit a chuireann cúnamh agus comhairle ar fáil don Uachtarán
Before the President can exercise some of their functions, they must consult with the Council of State
Ní mór don Uachtarán dul i gcomhairle leis an gComhairle Stáit roimh dó/dí cuid de na feidhmeanna, atá aige/aici a chur i gcrích
The President must consult with the Council of State before they can convene a meeting of one or both Houses of the Oireachtas
Ní mór don Uachtarán comhairle a ghlacadh ón gComhairle Stáit roimh dó/dí cruinniú de cheachtar nó de dhá Theach an Oireachtais a thionól
The President must also consult with the Council of State in order to exercise some of their powers in relation to legislation
Ní mór don Uachtarán freisin dul i gcomhairle leis an gComhairle Stáit maidir le cuid dá c(h)umhachtaí a bhaineann le reachtaíocht a chur i gcrích
The Council of State was established under Article 31 of Bunreacht na hEireann (the Constitution)
Bunadh an Chomhairle Stáit faoi alt 31 Bunreacht na hÉireann
There are 3 categories of members of the Council of State:
Tá trí rannóg daoine gur féidir leo a bheith ina mbaill den Chomhairle Stáit:
• Ex- officio members are those who are members by virtue of their office
• De bhua oifige atá na daoine seo ina mbaill
These include the Taoiseach, the Tanáiste, the Chief Justice, the President of the High Court, the Ceann Comhairle of the Dáil, the Cathaoirleach of the Seanad and the Attorney General
Ina measc tá an Taoiseach, an Tánaiste , an Príomh-Bhreitheamh, Uachtarán na hArd-Chúirte, Ceann Comhairle Dháil Éireann, Cathaoirleach Sheanad Éireann agus an tArd-Aighne
These include every former President, Taoiseach and Chief Justice who is able and willing to act
Ina measc Iar Uachtaráin, Iar Thaoisigh agus Iar Phríomh-Bhreithimh a bhfuil sé ar a gcumas agus ar fonn leo gníomhú
• Members appointed by the President
• Baill ceapaithe ag an Uachtarán
The President can appoint up to 7 members whose term on the Council only lasts as long as the President is in office
Is féidir leis an Uachtarán suas le seachtar a cheapadh agus maireann a dtréimhse ar an gComhairle chomh fada agus a mhaireann téarma oifige an Uachtaráin sin
If the President has sufficient reason, he or she can terminate the appointment of any of these members
Má tá fáth réasúnta ag an Uachtarán, is féidir leis/léi deireadh a chur le ceapachán na mball sin
